issue.title: [CF 1411] Frozen orb CD don't refresh with honor talent into PvP
issue.body:
Issue with honor talent for frost mage (id 632). When it selected TMW don't refresh CD of Frozen orb. I mean I used it and icon don't show me CD of orb. Please, fix it!
Note: You can see issue with CD only in PvP zone like arena, where honor talent work!


> Posted by CurseForge user Aynni | Imported from CurseForge issue #1411 | Raw

comments.body:
Works fine for me.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Checked again, doesn't work


> Posted by CurseForge user Aynni
